subject: Baseball
Theater
lead_paragraph: “Bronx Bombers,” a new Broadway production, centers on Yogi Berra’s distress over a feud between Billy Martin and Reggie Jackson and leads to a reunion of greats.
snippet: “Bronx Bombers,” a new Broadway production, centers on Yogi Berra’s distress over a feud between Billy Martin and Reggie Jackson and leads to a reunion of greats.
